armies.name: black templars
armies.description: A zealous chapter of Space Marines, known for their fervent hatred of witches and psykers.

armies.name: blood angels
armies.description: Noble and fierce warriors with a tragic flaw, prone to the Black Rage and Red Thirst.

armies.name: dark angels
armies.description: A secretive chapter, seeking redemption for their fallen brethren, the Fallen Angels.

armies.name: space marines
armies.description: The standard bearers of the Imperium, versatile and adept at various combat roles.

armies.name: space wolves
armies.description: The savage and noble warriors from Fenris, known for their ferocity in battle.
